text: The 1968 European Karate Championships, the 3rd edition, was held in the sports complex of Coubertine Hall in Paris, France from May 2 to 4, 1968. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Ippon |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1968 1968 Category:International sports competitions hosted by France Category:1968 in French sport European Championships, 1968 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Paris Category:1968 in Paris European Championships, 1968 Category:May 1968 sports events
title: 1968 European Karate Championships
